<script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
const loggedInUser = sessionStorage.getItem('lmsp_user');
const loginButton = document.getElementById('loginButton');
const logoutButton = document.getElementById('logoutButton');
const userInfo = document.getElementById('userInfo');
const adminContent = document.getElementById('adminContent');
const restrictedMessage = document.getElementById('restrictedMessage');

if (loggedInUser) {
loginButton.style.display = 'none';
logoutButton.style.display = 'inline-block';
userInfo.style.display = 'block';
userInfo.textContent = 'Logged in as: ' + loggedInUser;
adminContent.style.display = 'block';
restrictedMessage.style.display = 'none';
showTab('tab-timeline');
} else {
loginButton.style.display = 'inline-block';
logoutButton.style.display = 'none';
userInfo.style.display = 'none';
adminContent.style.display = 'none';
restrictedMessage.style.display = 'block';
}
});

function logout() {
sessionStorage.removeItem('lmsp_user');
sessionStorage.removeItem('lmsp_loginTime');
localStorage.removeItem('lmsp_user');
localStorage.removeItem('lmsp_rememberTime');
location.reload();
}

function showTab(tabId) {
const tabContents = document.querySelectorAll('.tab-content');
tabContents.forEach(content => content.style.display = 'none');

const tabButtons = document.querySelectorAll('.tab-btn');
tabButtons.forEach(btn => btn.classList.remove('active'));

const selectedTab = document.getElementById(tabId);
if (selectedTab) selectedTab.style.display = 'block';

if (event && event.target) event.target.classList.add('active');
}
</script>

<style>
.admin-header { display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; margin-bottom: 20px; padding: 15px; background: #f5f5f5; border-radius: 5px; border-left: 4px solid #2a5298; }
#userInfo { color: #2e7d32; font-weight: 600; font-size: 14px; }
.auth-buttons { display: flex; gap: 10px; }
button.auth-btn, a.auth-btn { padding: 8px 16px; border-radius: 5px; border: none; cursor: pointer; font-weight: 600; text-decoration: none; display: inline-block; font-size: 13px; transition: all 0.3s ease; }
button.auth-btn.login, a.auth-btn.login { background: #2a5298; color: white; }
button.auth-btn.logout { background: #d32f2f; color: white; }
button.auth-btn:hover, a.auth-btn:hover { opacity: 0.85; transform: translateY(-1px); }
.tab-buttons { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 5px; margin-bottom: 20px; border-bottom: 2px solid #ddd; }
.tab-btn { padding: 12px 20px; background: #f0f0f0; border: none; cursor: pointer; font-weight: 600; color: #333; border-radius: 5px 5px 0 0; transition: all 0.3s ease; font-size: 14px; }
.tab-btn:hover { background: #e0e0e0; }
.tab-btn.active { background: #2a5298; color: white; }
.tab-content { display: none; padding: 20px; background: #fafafa; border-radius: 5px; border: 1px solid #ddd; }
.tab-content h3 { color: #1e3c72; margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 15px; border-bottom: 2px solid #2a5298; padding-bottom: 10px; }
.tab-content a { color: #2a5298; text-decoration: none; font-weight: 600; }
.tab-content a:hover { text-decoration: underline; }
.info-box { background: white; padding: 15px; border-left: 4px solid #2a5298; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 5px; }
.info-box strong { color: #1e3c72; }
</style>
